name: desafioclase16_basedatos
description: Desafio Clase 16: Nuestra Primera Base de Datos

scripts.knex-up: knex migrate:up --env products_data && knex migrate:up --env messages_data
scripts.knex-down: knex migrate:rollback --env products_data && knex migrate:rollback --env messages_data
scripts.knex-list: knex migrate:list --env products_data && knex migrate:list --env messages_data

author: Jorge Pauvels <jcvels@uvcoding.com.ar>
